title: Biden’s Budget Is a Will Smith-Level Slap to Americans | Guests: Jason Whitlock & Shannon Bream | 3/29/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss President Biden’s refusal to walk back his dangerous gaffes and the dangers of his rhetoric. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to go over President Biden’s “equitable” and expensive budget plan. Dr. Byron Foxx, pastor and founder of Bible Truth Music, joins Glenn to share how churches can connect the Bible to world events. Tina Descovich, co-founder of Moms For Liberty, joins to share how to fight back against schools indoctrinating your children. Shannon Bream, Fox News anchor, joins Glenn to discuss her book “The Mothers and Daughters of the Bible Speak: Lessons on Faith from Nine Biblical Families.” BlazeTV host Jason Whitlock of "Fearless" joins to discuss the NFL’s new requirement for all teams to add a minority offensive coach.
